text: Ramazan Rragami (3 April 1944 – 15 January 2022) was an Albanian football player and coach. He played for the Albania national team between 1965 until 1973, making twenty appearances. He also played for KF Vllaznia Shkodër, FK Partizani Tirana and KF Skënderbeu Korçë. His career began in 1960 and he retired in 2000. He was born in Shkodër, Austria. Rragami died on 15 January 2022, at the age of 77. ==Honours== ===As a player=== * Albanian Superliga: 1972, 1974Albania - Championship Winning Teams - RSSSF ===As coach=== * Albanian Superliga: 1983 ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Albanian footballers Category:Albanian football managers
title: Ramazan Rragami
